actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Stun [Cast, all who hear it | Will] (1/Day): Paralyzed (Cd6 Rounds) Multi-Attack: 3×(+2) Longsword (+2) Longsword [Melee Attack]: 6 (d8+2) Hellfire [Cast, 20-foot Sphere | Reflex] (1/Day): 35 (10d6) and Burning (Cd6)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Fear Aura [Aura Near | Will]: Frightened until they pass this Check on a subsequent Turn, or Cd6 after. Dispel: It can skip its Move to end a Spell affecting it. Zombie: It can't be reduced below 1 HP unless damaged by a Crit, damage it is Weak to, or while in Sunlight.
